sig_info: 100% chance to activate a Self-Repair Buff lasting 12 seconds and recovering 166.85 to 470.08 Health. This Buff is lost if Hulkbuster is Stunned.
Giant-Buster: +17.6 to 88.04 Attack rating while Self-Repair is active.
Iron Wall: +10 to 40.01% Self-Repair Potency.

WHILE FIGHTING AS AN ATTACKER: Enter Giant-Buster Mode, granting the following:
Up to +22 Attack rating based on how large the opponent is.
+24.64 Attack rating for each Shock effect on the opponent.
WHILE FIGHTING AS A DEFENDER: Enter Iron Wall Mode, enhancing Hulkbuster’s defensive abilities.
PASSIVE: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
START OF FIGHT & EVERY 15 SECONDS: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
BROUGHT BELOW 15% HEALTH - ONCE PER FIGH: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
If in Iron Wall, gain a second Armor Up Buff.
FIGHTING NON-COSMIC CHAMPIONS: For each Armor Up Buff Hulkbuster gains the following benefits:
+685.71 Energy Resistance.
+66.67 Critical Damage Rating.
Incoming Bleed & Poison Debuffs suffer -25% Potency.
Enemy attacks suffer -20% Offensive Ability Accuracy.
Enemy attacks suffer -104.67 Critical Damage Rating.
WHEN STRUCK BY CRITICAL HITS: 60% chance to consume 1 Armor Up Buff to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 39.6 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
60% chance to consume 1 Armor Up Buff to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 57.2 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 48.4 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 2400 for 20 seconds.
100% chance to gain an Unblockable Buff, lasting 1 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to Stun for 1.50 second(s).
If the opponent’s block is broken by the attack, all of Hulkbuster’s Armor Up Buffs are consumed to add +1.25 second(s) duration to the Stun Debuff for each Armor Up consumed this way.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the opponents block is broken by this attack, all Beam attacks have a 100% chance to inflict Power Burn, draining 1 Bar(s) of Power per hit and inflicting direct damage proportional to the Power drained.
100% chance to Power Lock, severing the target's flow of Power for 3 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This Attack Drains 50% of the Opponent’s current Power.
Inflicts up to 3 Shock Debuffs, with each having a 80% chance to activate, dealing 48.4 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
Unblockable Buffs triggered during this attack gain +4.5 seconds duration.

Unblockable Buffs triggered during this attack gain +4.5 seconds duration.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to Stun for 1.50 second(s).
If the opponent’s block is broken by the attack, all of Hulkbuster’s Armor Up Buffs are consumed to add +1.25 second(s) duration to the Stun Debuff for each Armor Up consumed this way.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the opponents block is broken by this attack, all Beam attacks have a 100% chance to inflict Power Burn, draining 1 Bar(s) of Power per hit and inflicting direct damage proportional to the Power drained.
100% chance to Power Lock, severing the target's flow of Power for 3 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: This Attack Drains 50% of the Opponent’s current Power.
Inflicts up to 3 Shock Debuffs, with each having a 80% chance to activate, dealing 37.95 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
Unblockable Buffs triggered during this attack gain +4.5 seconds duration.

WHILE FIGHTING AS AN ATTACKER: Enter Giant-Buster Mode, granting the following:
Up to +24 Attack rating based on how large the opponent is.
+26.88 Attack rating for each Shock effect on the opponent.
WHILE FIGHTING AS A DEFENDER: Enter Iron Wall Mode, enhancing Hulkbuster’s defensive abilities.
PASSIVE: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
START OF FIGHT & EVERY 15 SECONDS: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
BROUGHT BELOW 15% HEALTH - ONCE PER FIGH: Gain an indefinite Armor Up, granting +282.35 Armor rating.
If in Iron Wall, gain a second Armor Up Buff.
FIGHTING NON-COSMIC CHAMPIONS: For each Armor Up Buff Hulkbuster gains the following benefits:
+685.71 Energy Resistance.
+66.67 Critical Damage Rating.
Incoming Bleed & Poison Debuffs suffer -25% Potency.
Enemy attacks suffer -20% Offensive Ability Accuracy.
Enemy attacks suffer -104.67 Critical Damage Rating.
WHEN STRUCK BY CRITICAL HITS: 60% chance to consume 1 Armor Up Buff to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 43.2 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
60% chance to consume 1 Armor Up Buff to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 62.4 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict a Shock Debuff, dealing 52.8 direct Energy Damage over 10 seconds.
